links: Index entries for continued fractions for constants
formula: a(n)=-6*(n mod 3)+4*[(n+1) mod 3]+14*[(n+2) mod 3]-16*[C(2*n,n) mod 2], with n>=0 [From _Paolo P. Lava_, Apr 20 2009]
mathematica: ContinuedFraction[Sqrt[269],90] (* or *) PadRight[{16},90,{32,2,2}] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Dec 18 2012 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
